Please remember to slow down and stop when Buses are out. Twin Brothers Xzavier and Mason Ingle and their sister Alivia Stahl were killed when a woman ran a bus stop, the bus was stopped with its stop sign out. An 11 year old boy was also hurt. These children were killed right outside their home at their bus stop.

Words cannot express how sorry I feel for this family. Parents please if you can, take the time to walk with your kids or at least be aware of all surroundings. Alot of times kids get antsy to the be the first one on the bus or get the best seat and that is what they are focused on. Sometimes they do not realize the bus has not fully stopped yet.

I would also encourage parents to please talk to your children about their bus behavior. I always try to think what if I was the one driving that bus how would I want my children to treat me.
